name: Objective: Stealth
description: Objective: Stealth is a short stealth game made for the 43rd GMC Game Jam, where the theme was "Single Point of Entry".  Play as a clueless man named Marco who somehow got himself into the freelance business.  Start out on the roof and work your way down to the first floor, where your objective awaits you. However, there is only a "Single Point of Entry" on each floor, to go to the floor below - an elevator - and it's heavily guarded. The game is made harder by the important rule: No Killing Allowed.
